class.name: AudioEffectPitchShift
class.brief_description: Adds a Pitch shift audio effect to an Audio bus. Raises or lowers the pitch of original sound.
class.description: Allows modulation of pitch independently of tempo. All frequencies can be increased/decreased with minimal effect on transients.

members.member: Pitch value. Can range from 0 (-1 octave) to 16 (+16 octaves).
